item.title: Python, envoyer des pièces attachées par mail
item.description: #!/usr/bin/python3 import smtplib import os import mimetypes from email.mime.text import MIMEText from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart from email.mime.base import MIMEBase from email import Encoders from email.Utils import COMMASPACE, formatdate def send_mail(send_from, send_to, subject, text, files=[], smtp_server='smtp.example.com'): assert type(send_to)==list assert type(files)==list msg = MIMEMultipart() msg['From'] = send_from msg['To'] = COMMASPACE.join(send_to) msg['Date'] = formatdate(localtime=True) msg['Subject'] = subject msg.attach( MIMEText(text) ) for f in files: (mimetype, encoding) = mimetypes.guess_type(f) if mimetype is not None: part = MIMEBase(*mimetype.
